titleStmt.title: Christian liberty not to be abused, or, Antient and primitive truth correcting some modern, or new abuses, of that which is so much pleaded for, and so little understood, viz. Christian liberty in a sermon preached in the church of Bridport within the county of Dorset, on Sunday the forenoon, being November 3. 1672 ... / by Rich. Luce ...
titleStmt.author: Luce, Richard, Presbyter of the Church of England.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
